meanings.definition: Any of a group of naturally occurring fatty acids that have a variety of hormonelike effects in animals.
meanings.sent1: Prostaglandins play a role in regulating hormones in animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of prostaglandins on animal hormones.
meanings.sent3: The prostaglandins in the animal kingdom are like tiny hormone messengers.
meanings.sent4: In the animal world, prostaglandins act as hormone conductors.
meanings.sent5: Imagine prostaglandins as tiny hormone controllers in animals.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of physiologically active lipid compounds having diverse hormone-like effects in animals.
meanings.sent1: The diverse effects of prostaglandins on animal hormones are being researched.
meanings.sent2: Prostaglandins are important lipid compounds with hormone-like effects in animals.
meanings.sent3: The lipid compounds known as prostaglandins are like hormone magicians in animals.
meanings.sent4: Prostaglandins, the hormone-like lipids, have a variety of effects in animals.
meanings.sent5: Visualize prostaglandins as versatile hormone mimics in animals.
